title: Farmer Suicide Data from 2017-2021
selftext: It's pretty obvious that some states are hiding the data.
comments: Didn't know there is farming done in the Andmans let alone farmers suicide

Interesting... Assuming that these datas are correct, then I wonder how it relates to climate change and moonson disruption?


It seems to me that the most affected states are the ones where agriculture is more reliant on monsoon waters :


In the North, the main rivers are fed by Himalayan glaciers and thus not so dependant on monsoonal rains, whereas Deccan's rivers are thoroughly dependant on monsoonal rains and a disruption in the monsoon season may signify a greater crop failure...



I am just speculating and besides these, there must be other reasons of course ..
